languages.text: {n}Внезапно старик запрокидывает голову — тело его содрогается, и сквозь стиснутые зубы вырываются брызги крови.{/n} "Лучи заката окрасят сердце леса в алый, если тьма покинет его, а две звезды разойдутся и сойдутся вновь! Алые... Алые... Алые... Гаснущий свет еще можно спасти..." {n}Жрец прикрывает лицо руками и, медленно выдыхая, приходит в себя.{/n} "П-простите этого слугу, посланни{mf|к|ца}. Порой сны наяву самые... болезненные..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Внезапно старик запрокидывает голову — тело его содрогается, и сквозь стиснутые зубы вырываются брызги крови.{/n} "Лучи заката окрасят сердце леса в алый, если тьма покинет его, а две звезды разойдутся и сойдутся вновь! Алые... Алые... Алые... Гаснущий свет еще можно спасти..." {n}Жрец прикрывает лицо руками и, медленно выдыхая, приходит в себя.{/n} "П-простите этого слугу, посланни{mf|к|ца}. Порой сны на яву самые... болезненные..."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}Suddenly, the old man throws his head back — his body shudders, and droplets of blood burst from between his clenched teeth.{/n} "The sunset rays will paint the heart of the forest crimson if the darkness leaves it, and the two stars will part, then meet again! Crimson... Crimson... The fading light can still be saved..." {n}The priest covers his face with his hands and breathes slowly, finally coming to his senses.{/n} "F-forgive this servant, Sky-Herald. The waking dreams are often the most... painful..."
languages.original_text: {n}Внезапно старик запрокидывает голову — тело его содрогается, и сквозь стиснутые зубы вырываются брызги крови.{/n} "Лучи заката окрасят сердце леса в алый, если тьма покинет его, а две звезды разойдутся и сойдутся вновь! Алые... Алые... Алые... Гаснущий свет еще можно спасти..." {n}Жрец прикрывает лицо руками и, медленно выдыхая, приходит в себя.{/n} "П-простите этого слугу, посланни{mf|к|ца}. Порой сны наяву самые... болезненные..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Suddenly, the old man throws his head up — his body shudders, the droplets of blood burst from in-between his clenched teeth.{/n} "The sunset rays will paint the heart of the forest crimson if the darkness leaves it, and the two stars will part, then meet again! Crimson... Crimson... The fading light can still be saved..." {n}The priest covers his face with his hands and breathes slowly, finally coming to his senses.{/n} "F-Forgive this servant, Heavenly Envoy. The waking dreams are often the most... painful..."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

Crimson... Crimson... The fading light can still be saved..." {n}The priest covers his face with his hands and breathes slowly, finally coming to his senses.{/n} "F-forgive this servant, Sky-Herald. languages.text: {n}De repente, el anciano echa la cabeza para atrás; su cuerpo se convulsiona, y unas gotas de sangre asoman entre sus dientes apretados.{/n} «¡Los rayos del sol poniente pintarán de carmesí el corazón del bosque si la oscuridad lo abandona, y las dos estrellas se separarán y luego volverán a encontrarse! Carmesí... carmesí... la luz macilenta aún puede salvarse...». {n}El sacerdote se cubre el rostro con ambas manos y respira lentamente, recobrando por fin la compostura.{/n} «D-disculpa a este siervo, {mf|Emisario|Emisaria} Celestial. Los sueños en vigilia suelen ser los más... dolorosos...».
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the old man throws his head back — his body shudders, and droplets of blood burst from between his clenched teeth.{/n} "The sunset rays will paint the heart of the forest crimson if the darkness leaves it, and the two stars will part, then meet again! Crimson... Crimson... The fading light can still be saved..." {n}The priest covers his face with his hands and breathes slowly, finally coming to his senses.{/n} "F-forgive this servant, Sky-Herald. The waking dreams are often the most... painful..."

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, el anciano echa la cabeza para atrás; su cuerpo se convulsiona, y unas gotas de sangre asoman entre sus dientes apretados.{/n} «¡Los rayos del sol poniente pintarán de carmesí el corazón del bosque si la oscuridad lo abandona, y las dos estrellas se separarán y luego volverán a encontrarse! Carmesí... carmesí... la luz macilenta aún puede salvarse...». {n}El sacerdote se cubre el rostro con ambas manos y respira lentamente, recobrando por fin la compostura.{/n} «D-disculpa a este siervo, {mf|Emisario|Emisaria} Celestial. Los sueños en vigilia suelen ser los más... dolorosos...».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}突然之间，老人抬起头来。他的身体剧烈颤抖，血滴从他紧咬的牙关中喷了出来。{/n}“如果黑暗离开，夕阳将把森林的中心染成深红色。两颗星星会分开，然后重新相会！深红……一片深红……但暗淡的光芒依然能得到拯救……”{n}祭司用手捂住脸，慢慢地呼着气，终于恢复了知觉。{/n}“圣使，请宽恕此仆人吧。在清醒的时候做梦，总是非常……痛苦……”
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the old man throws his head back — his body shudders, and droplets of blood burst from between his clenched teeth.{/n} "The sunset rays will paint the heart of the forest crimson if the darkness leaves it, and the two stars will part, then meet again! Crimson... Crimson... The fading light can still be saved..." {n}The priest covers his face with his hands and breathes slowly, finally coming to his senses.{/n} "F-forgive this servant, Sky-Herald. The waking dreams are often the most... painful..."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，老人抬起头来。他的身体剧烈颤抖，血滴从他紧咬的牙关中喷了出来。{/n}“如果黑暗离开，夕阳将把森林的中心染成深红色。两颗星星会分开，然后重新相会！深红……一片深红……但暗淡的光芒依然能得到拯救……”{n}祭司用手捂住脸，慢慢地呼着气，终于恢复了知觉。{/n}“天使，请宽恕此仆人吧。在清醒的时候做梦，总是非常……痛苦……”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}Soudain, le vieillard lève la tête vers le ciel ; son corps est pris de soubresauts et des gouttes de sang jaillissent à travers ses dents serrées.{/n} « Si les ténèbres quittent le cœur de la forêt, les rayons du couchant le peindront de rouge et les deux étoiles se sépareront avant de se réunir à nouveau ! Rouge... Rouge... Il est encore temps de sauver la lumière qui se meurt... » {n}Le prêtre se couvre le visage de ses mains et respire doucement, reprenant enfin ses esprits.{/n} « P... Pardonnez à ce serviteur, émissaire céleste. Les rêves éveillés sont souvent les plus... douloureux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the old man throws his head back — his body shudders, and droplets of blood burst from between his clenched teeth.{/n} "The sunset rays will paint the heart of the forest crimson if the darkness leaves it, and the two stars will part, then meet again! Crimson... Crimson... The fading light can still be saved..." {n}The priest covers his face with his hands and breathes slowly, finally coming to his senses.{/n} "F-forgive this servant, Sky-Herald. The waking dreams are often the most... painful..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, le vieil homme lève la tête vers le ciel ; son corps est pris de soubresauts et des gouttes de sang jaillissent à travers ses dents serrées.{/n} « Si les ténèbres quittent le cœur de la forêt, les rayons du couchant le peindront de rouge et les deux étoiles se sépareront avant de se réunir à nouveau ! Rouge... Rouge... Il est encore temps de sauver la lumière qui se meurt... » {n}Le prêtre se couvre le visage de ses mains et respire doucement, reprenant enfin ses esprits.{/n} « P... Pardonnez à ce serviteur, émissaire céleste. Les rêves éveillés sont souvent les plus... douloureux. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n} 突然、老人は頭をもたげた…体を震わせ、食いしばった歯の間から血のしずくがはじけた。 {/n}「闇が去れば、夕日が森の中心を真紅に染める。そして2つの星は別れ、再び出会う！真紅…真紅…消えゆく光は、まだ救われる…」{n}司祭は両手で顔を覆い、ゆっくりと呼吸を整え、ようやく正気に戻った。{/n}「天の先駆者よ、このしもべをお許しください。目覚めの夢は、しばしば最も…苦しいものなのです…」
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the old man throws his head back — his body shudders, and droplets of blood burst from between his clenched teeth.{/n} "The sunset rays will paint the heart of the forest crimson if the darkness leaves it, and the two stars will part, then meet again! Crimson... Crimson... The fading light can still be saved..." {n}The priest covers his face with his hands and breathes slowly, finally coming to his senses.{/n} "F-forgive this servant, Sky-Herald. The waking dreams are often the most... painful..."

traits.locale_text: {n} 突然、老人は頭をもたげた…体を震わせ、食いしばった歯の間から血のしずくがはじけた。 {/n}「闇が去れば、夕日が森の中心を真紅に染める。そして2つの星は別れ、再び出会う！真紅…真紅…消えゆく光は、まだ救われる…」{n}司祭は両手で顔を覆い、ゆっくりと呼吸を整え、ようやく正気に戻った。{/n}「天の使者よ、このしもべをお許しください。目覚めの夢は、しばしば最も…苦しいものなのです…」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich wirft der alte Mann den Kopf in den Nacken. Sein Körper schaudert und Bluttropfen spritzen zwischen seinen zusammengebissenen Zähnen hervor.{/n} "Die Strahlen des Sonnenuntergangs werden das Herz des Waldes rot färben, wenn die Dunkelheit ihn verlässt, und die zwei Sterne werden auseinandergehen und sich dann wieder begegnen! Rot ... Rot ... Das schwindende Licht kann noch gerettet werden ..." {n}Der Priester bedeckt sein Gesicht mit den Händen und atmet langsam. Er kommt endlich wieder zu Sinnen.{/n} "V-Vergebt diesem Diener, Himmel-Herold. Die Wachträume sind oft die ... schmerzhaftesten ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the old man throws his head back — his body shudders, and droplets of blood burst from between his clenched teeth.{/n} "The sunset rays will paint the heart of the forest crimson if the darkness leaves it, and the two stars will part, then meet again! Crimson... Crimson... The fading light can still be saved..." {n}The priest covers his face with his hands and breathes slowly, finally coming to his senses.{/n} "F-forgive this servant, Sky-Herald. The waking dreams are often the most... painful..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich wirft der alte Mann den Kopf in den Nacken. Sein Körper schaudert und Bluttropfen spritzen zwischen seinen zusammengebissenen Zähnen hervor.{/n} "Die Strahlen des Sonnenuntergangs werden das Herz des Waldes rot färben, wenn die Dunkelheit ihn verlässt, und die zwei Sterne werden auseinandergehen und sich dann wieder begegnen! Rot ... Rot ... Das schwindende Licht kann noch gerettet werden ..." {n}Der Priester bedeckt sein Gesicht mit den Händen und atmet langsam. Er kommt endlich wieder zu Sinnen.{/n} "V-Vergebt diesem Diener, {mf|himmlischer Gesandter|himmlische Gesandte}. Die Wachträume sind oft die ... schmerzhaftesten ..."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Shaman

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar adam, aniden kafasını arkaya atıyor. Bedeni titriyor ve sıkı sıkıya kapadığı dişlerinin arasından kan damlaları fışkırıyor.{/n} "Gün batımı ışınları, karanlık azat ederse ormanın kalbini kızıla boyayacak. İki yıldızın yolları ayrılacak, ardından yıldızlar yeniden kavuşacaklar! Kızıl... Kızıl... Solan ışık, hâlâ kurtarılabilir." {n}Rahip, elleriyle yüzünü kapatıyor. Yavaşça nefes alarak en sonunda kendine geliyor.{/n} "B... Bu hizmetkârı affet Gök Müjdecisi. Uyanık düşler, sıklıkla... En acı verenlerdir."
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly, the old man throws his head back — his body shudders, and droplets of blood burst from between his clenched teeth.{/n} "The sunset rays will paint the heart of the forest crimson if the darkness leaves it, and the two stars will part, then meet again! Crimson... Crimson... The fading light can still be saved..." {n}The priest covers his face with his hands and breathes slowly, finally coming to his senses.{/n} "F-forgive this servant, Sky-Herald. The waking dreams are often the most... painful..."
